Kai Blin wrote:
 > According to samba4's prog_guide.txt:
> "That said, I don't want to invent a new style, instead I would like to adopt 
> the style used by the Linux kernel."

   I wonder if the old "indent" program has the right options
to do the Linux Kernel style: that would make it easy for individual
to develop in the style they prefer, but contribute in the shared style.

--dave (at a former employer, the official style was
	"anything that indent can produce" (:-)) c-b
